dependencies.description:
Apache Avro is a data serialization system. Note: lang/py3 version (this
package) will be deprecated and lang/py functions will be made available
for both python2 and python3.
dependencies.name: py-avro-python3

dependencies.description:
Python module for generating objects that compute the Cyclic Redundancy
Check (CRC)
dependencies.name: py-crcmod

dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.
dependencies.name: py-cython

dependencies.description: Serialize all of python
dependencies.name: py-dill

dependencies.description: Fastavro for Python.
dependencies.name: py-fastavro

dependencies.description: Clean single-source support for Python 3 and 2
dependencies.name: py-future

dependencies.description: HTTP/2-based RPC framework.
dependencies.name: py-grpcio

dependencies.description: API and command line interface for HDFS
dependencies.name: py-hdfs

dependencies.description: A comprehensive HTTP client library.
dependencies.name: py-httplib2

dependencies.description:
mock is a library for testing in Python. It allows you to replace parts
of your system under test with mock objects and make assertions about
how they have been used.
dependencies.name: py-mock

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description:
OAuth 2.0 client library. Note: oauth2client is now deprecated. No more
features will be added to the libraries and the core team is turning
down support. We recommend you use google-auth and oauthlib.
dependencies.name: py-oauth2client

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
Protocol buffers are Google's language-neutral, platform-neutral,
extensible mechanism for serializing structured data - think XML, but
smaller, faster, and simpler. You define how you want your data to be
structured once, then you can use special generated source code to
easily write and read your structured data to and from a variety of data
streams and using a variety of languages.
dependencies.name: py-protobuf

dependencies.description:
A cross-language development platform for in-memory data. This package
contains the Python bindings.
dependencies.name: py-pyarrow

dependencies.description: Python interface to Graphviz's Dot language
dependencies.name: py-pydot

dependencies.description:
The PyMongo distribution contains tools for interacting with MongoDB
database from Python. The bson package is an implementation of the BSON
format for Python. The pymongo package is a native Python driver for
MongoDB. The gridfs package is a gridfs implementation on top of
pymongo.
dependencies.name: py-pymongo

dependencies.description: Extensions to the standard Python datetime module.
dependencies.name: py-python-dateutil

dependencies.description: World timezone definitions, modern and historical.
dependencies.name: py-pytz

dependencies.description: Python HTTP for Humans.
dependencies.name: py-requests

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).
dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions

dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.
dependencies.name: py-wheel

dependencies.description: The Python programming language.
dependencies.name: python

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: The new Python SDK for Sentry.io
dependent_to.name: py-sentry-sdk

description: Apache Beam is a unified programming model for Batch and Streaming.
name: py-apache-beam

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
